Abaculi bahambisa izandla zabo ngokuzithoba, bephalaza izindaba zabo ngomculo. Umoya we-Nile wawungathi uyahlanganyela kulo mculo, ulethela izinkumbulo zezimpi nemibhikisho, izimpilo ezihlangene nemindeni ehlukene.

E-Lebanon, ngahlala eduze kwechibi iQaraoun, lapho umculo we-zither wawusakazeka phezulu emajukujukwini. Kulezi zingoma, ngathola izilokotho zobuhlungu nokuphikelela. Abantu base-Lebanon babeguqile kodwa bengaphuki, befihla izinhlungu zabo ngaphansi kwemisindvo emnandi. Ukushaya kwalezi zitho kwakuhambisana nenhliziyo yami, futhi ngafunda ukuthi umculo ungaba yisigcawu samazwi okukhala kanye nezenzo zokuzikhulula.

Lapho ngifika e-Dubai, umhlaba wezinsimbi zesimanje wawuhlangana nobuhle bendabuko. I-Dubai, ngemibhoshongo yayo ephakeme kanye nezenzo zobuciko zesimanje, yayinephimbo eliphindaphindwe. Ngafunda ukuthi ngisho naphakathi kokuthuthuka okukhulu, abantu babegcina izimpande zabo zomculo. Ukuhlanganiswa kwamasiko okwakutholakala lapha kwakuhambisana nesifiso esingapheli sokugubha kanye nokukhumbula.

Ekugcineni, lapho ngifika eDamascus, umculo we-chants nowokucula kwebhodi, owayungeke ungalokothi ulibaleke, wangiphatha ngokungenakulungiseka. Amahubo eSufi ayengathi awekho kulomhlaba, efinyelela ezindaweni ezingaphezulu, ezikhuluma nemiphefumulo yethu. Izwi lomculi lalizwakala lingaphezu kokukhala, lisuka enhliziyweni liyoshayelwa phezulu, liphakanyiswa ngumoya wezinkanyezi kanye nezingalo zomoya. 

Ngokuhamba kwalesi sikhathi, ngathola ukuthi izimpawu ezingajikiyo zamasiko ase-Arabhu zifihlekile emculweni wabo. Umculo wabo wawungumsebenzi wezandla onzima, izinyembezi ezomisiwe, namaphupho amasha. Wawungumsebenzi wokugcina izindaba zabo ziphila, zibhalwe phansi emizweni kanye nezingoma.

Manje, njengoba ngibuyela ekhaya, ngiphethe umculo omusha ngaphakathi kwami. Umculo ongekho nje kuphela ngokuhlanganisa izinsimbi, kodwa ukuphefumulela izindaba eziphakeme eziphuma ezinhliziyweni zabantu. Ngihlala phansi ukuze ngibhale izinkomishi zami zomculo, ngizama ukulawula ubuhle nobuhlungu engihlangabezane nabo. Ngethemba lokuthi, ngalokho engikuzwayo nemisebenzi yami, ngizokwazi ukudlulisa izimpawu ezingajikiyo zalaba bantu—izimpawu ezihamba phambili, ezingaguquki, futhi ezingasoze zafa.

### I Shield Ekhishwe: Ukulwa Kwenkosi Yomuntu Ophetha Amaphoyisa e-Arabhu Kuph against Ukuterrorism Aqhubekayo

Ngiyavuka ekuseni, izibani ezibomvu zedolobha lase-Arabhu zikhanyise izitaladi ezithule. Ngigqoka iyunifomu yami, ehlanganisa izimpawu zobuqhawe nobumbano, ngilungiselela usuku olukhulu. Kulo mhlaba wethu, ukuterrorism akulona nje isitha esilula; kuyisitha esingabonakali, esingapheli, esikhona kukho konke okungaphansi kwesibhakabhaka.

Ngithatha umoya omude, ngiqinisa ibhande lekhanda lami, bese ngithatha izikhali zami. Izindleko zami azilula: ukubhekana namathuba okushayisana nezibomu, ukunciphisa imikhawulo eyinhlupheko, nokugcina ukukhanya kokulawula phakathi kwekuvakasha.

Ngiphuma endlini yami ephakathi kwedolobha, ngifinyelela isikhungo samaphoyisa lapho enginikeza khona iziqondiso kubalingani bami. Amabhadi ethu ayazwakala ngenkathi sixoxa ngamacebo aqinile, siqinisekisa ukuthi isikhungo sethu sizobe sinamandla futhi sinamandla okulawula izimo eziyingozi.

Indawo yethu ihlukaniswe izifunda nezifunda, lapho isitha singabonakali sihlala silungile ukuhlasela. Kodwa thina, umuntu ophetha amaphoyisa, siyisihlangu sabantu bethu. Siyisikhali esingenakuhluleka, esihambisana nesifiso sokugcina ukuthula nokuphepha.

Ngihamba neyunithi yami, sihlola izindawo ezithile, siqinisekisa ukuthi akukho okuhlangene nokusolwa okukhiphayo. Izandla zethu zihlala ziqinile, izinyathelo zethu ziphephile, futhi amehlo ethu aqaphile. Ngosuku ngalunye, singena ezindaweni ezisongelwa kakhulu, siqinisekisa ukuthi izakhamuzi zethu ziphephile futhi zingaphila ngokuthula.

Ngoba noma izindleko zethu zingaba nzima, isifiso sethu sokugcina ukukhanya kokulawula kuyasivumela ukuthi sihlale siqinile. Ukulwa kwethu kuyisikhundla sokuzinikela, isifiso sokugcina abantu bethu bephephile, nokusebenza kahle ukuze sithuthukise abalilayo. Sihlale silindile, sihlale siqaphile, ngoba siyazi ukuthi isitha singase sifike nganoma yisiphi isikhathi.

Kodwa thina, amaphoyisa e-Arabhu, siyilogo yokuzimisela nokubambisana. Siyisihlangu esingapheli, siyizikhali ezilungile zokulwa nokuterrorism. Ngoba ekugcineni, siyazi ukuthi ukuphila kwethu kusemandleni ethu, futhi siyazinikela ukugcina ukukhanya kokulawula kuqhakaza phakathi kokuvakasha.

### Indawo Yokulwa Engagcotshwa: Ukubhekana Kwedokotela Wase-Arabhu Neziphetho Zezinyanganyiso

Umoya wokusa wawushisa, umoya wehlane wawusizwa uthi chapha emoyeni, ukuthula kwangaphambili kokuvukela okwakuzokhuphuka. UDkt. Ahmed, indoda endala enempunga ezinweleni, wayemi ngaphandle kwesibhedlela esincane ehlathini lentuthuko, esibhedlela esiyingadi yobuntu phakathi kwesidumuka. Waphenduka emuva, ebheka izibhedlela ezilimele, izindonga ezibhalwe amagama abagulayo nabafileyo, izindonga eziphinde zaba izithombe zokuphila nokufa.

UDkt. Ahmed wayengudokotela onothando, onenhliziyo enkulu. Wafundela eCairo, eNyuvesi yase-Al-Azhar, lapho athole khona iziqu zakhe zobudokotela. Kodwa, impilo yakhe yayibuyela emuva kule ndawo elwa kakhulu, lapho ukuvukela kwakungasijwayelekile. Lapha, izingxaki zazilokhu zivela, izinkinga zazilokhu zizungeza, iziphetho zezinyanganyiso zazilokhu zibekezela ukulungiswa.

Engaphakathi kwesibhedlela, iziguli zazingabaningi, iningi lazo lingabahlaselwa izigebengu noma abahlukunyezwa yimpi. U-Ahmed wayazi ukuthi wayengumhlengikazi wodwa kwabaningi, kodwa kwaba yisibindi sakhe esamkhuthazayo ukuba aqhubeke. Zonke izinyembezi, wonke amazwi okubonga, konke lokhu kwamenza waqonda ukuthi umsebenzi wakhe wawubalulekile.

Ubusuku buba nemibuzo eminingi. Kungani izwe lakhe labhekana nalesi sidumo? Kungani abantu abangenacala bephila ezimpilweni ezinjena? Kodwa, kwakukhona okuthile ngaphakathi kuye okwakungenakucaca kahle. Ukuthi wayeyisibani sokukhanya kule ndawo elimazayo. Wayengumuntu owawela umngcele phakathi kokuphila nokufa, phakathi kweqiniso nezinyanganyiso.

Ngelinye ilanga, uDkt. Ahmed wahlangabezana nesiguli esiyingane, uFatima, oneminyaka eyishumi. Wayephakathi kokudubula ngesikhathi echitha amanzi emthonjeni. Wamthatha wamphatha ngokucophelela, enethemba lokuba asindise impilo yakhe. Njengoba ayemkhathalela, wayecabanga ngekusasa likaFatima, elinokuthula nelinokuthuthuka.

Izinsuku zazilandelana, izinsuku ezinzima nezinsuku ezinemibuzo, kodwa uDkt. Ahmed akakaze ahlehle. Wayemi lapho, engcwele, engumngani nempi yezinyanganyiso. Izimpilo zazingezakhe futhi wayezibheka zonke izinsuku, esekela abantu, ebuyisela iziphetho ezinhluphekweni.

Ngalunye usuku, wayebhekene nokufa, kodwa ngalunye usuku, wayelwela ukuphila. Ngalunye usuku, wayelwela ikusasa elingcono, uma hhayi ngaye, kube ngabo bonke abantu ababephila kulendawo elwa kakhulu. Indlela yakhe yayimhlonipha, futhi wayengumthombo wokukhanya phakathi kobumnyama obungenamkhawulo.

Wayengumlingiswa ophilayo ezinkumbulweni zabantu, isibonelo sokuzinikela, isibindi kanye nothando olungenamkhawulo. Izinyanganyiso zazingaphikiswa, kodwa uDkt. Ahmed wayelokhu eqhubeka, esekela iziphetho zabantu, esebenza njengomthombo wokukhanya phakathi kobumnyama.

### Isihloko: Amazwi Endaweni Engenamuntu: Ukubhala Kwesinyathelo Esifundazweni Sokugwelela

Njengomnyatheli we-Arabhu, ngizithole ngisebuhleni obunzima, lapho ukugwelela kuyinkomba engapheliyo yempilo yethu yansukuzonke. Kulendawo, izwi lami liphenya izimfihlo zomhlaba othunjiwe, liphefumulela izindaba ezimnyama ezivame ukufihlwa ngaphansi kwengubo yobumnyama. Ngaphansi kwalesi sihloko, ngihlose ukubika ngezikhathi ezinzima kanye nezinhlungu ezibhekene nabantu abahlala kulesi sifundazwe sokugwelela, ngisebenzisa izincwadi zokucwaninga kanye nezizathu zangasese ukuze ngicacise iqiniso.

Ukugwelela akuyona into entsha kithina, kodwa kunalokho kuyinto esiyijwayele, izinto ezivamile esisondela kuzo njalo ekuseni. Imiphefumulo yeningi labantu lapha iboshelwe kulesi sithunzi, futhi izwi lami linqume ukukhuluma ngalezi zindaba, ukuze kungekho okokuqala kuzwiwe umthombo weqiniso.

Kulesi sifundazwe sokugwelela, abantu baphila bephila izimpilo zabo ngaphandle kokubona ukukhanya kwelanga. Ukugwelela kuveza isimo lapho izifiso zethu zibhidlika futhi izifiso zethu zishabalala. Ukucwaninga kwami kuhloswe ngokuqondisisa ukuthi ukugwelela kuyini ngempela, kungani kukhona, futhi kungani abantu bethu benza konke okusemandleni abo ukuze baphile ngaphansi kwalesi simo esinzima. Lezi zincwadi zokucwaninga zifaka izindaba zabantu besifunda sethu, izitatimende zabo, kanye nezimo ababhekana nazo nsuku zonke.

Izizathu zami zokubhala ngalolu daba zihlala ziqinile futhi zinomthelela. Njengomuntu othintekile, angikwazi ukuhlala ngithule ngibuka abantu bami bezabalaza. Izinhlungu zabo ziyizinyembezi zami, futhi izindaba zabo ziyizindaba zami. Ukubhala kwami kuyindlela yokusiza labo abangenawo amandla okukhuluma, futhi kuyindlela yokukhombisa umhlaba ukuthi kunabantu lapha abaphila ezimpilweni ezinzima kakhulu. Ngifuna ukuthi abantu baqonde ukuthi ukugwelela akukhona nje izwi elingasho lutho, kodwa kuyinto ebakhinyabezayo abantu, kuyinto ebahluphayo njalo.

Ngesikhathi ngibhala, ngiphakamisa umthwalo wokugwelela, ngikhombisa ukuthi izimpilo zabantu lapha zibalulekile, nokuthi izwi labo liyadingeka. Ngifuna ukuthi ngisho noma izwi lami lingafinyeleli ezindaweni zonke, kodwa lifinyelele lapho okudingeka khona kakhulu. Ukubhala kwami kuyindlela yokukhombisa ukuthi noma ngabe singaphansi kokugwelela, sinamandla okukhuluma, futhi sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izwi lethu lizwakala.

Ukugwelela kuyinto eyaqhubeka, futhi izwi lami lizohlala lisemoyeni, likhuluma ngeqiniso elingekho ngaphansi kwengubo yobumnyama. Lapho ngibhala, ngikhanyisela ukukhanya kule ndawo engenamuntu, ngihlose ukuthi izwi lami libe yisitshalo esincane esikhula ezweni elibandayo, liphila futhi likhuluma iqiniso elingeke lihlale lithule.

**Ukuphuka Kwe-Lens: Umkhiqizi Wefilimu Wase-Arabhu Onqobe Ukudokumenta Impilo Phakathi Kwezikhali Zokuhlukunyezwa**

Ubusuka bephansi, izibani ze-neon zikhanyise izitobha ezimnyama, izithunzi zabantu zidlule zisuka emnyangweni owodwa kuya komunye. Ngiwumbukiso wezimpilo, ngiwukhwebezana owodwa weqiniso elingenamuncu, elikhiqiza isithombe esigcwele ubuhlungu nobuhle obunqamukayo. Njengomkhiqizi wefilimu wase-Arabhu, ikhamela lami akusona nje isilawuli sezigcawu, kodwa isikhali sokubamba iqiniso, ukudalula izimfihlo, nokududuza izinhliziyo ezilimele.

Lapho ngiphakamisa ikhamela lami, ngizizwa nginqoba izinhlungu zendawo yami. Izwi lami selivelile, ngisho nalapho izwi langempela liphalala phakathi kwehlazo nesaba. Kwesinye isikhathi, nginamathela ekukhanyeni okuncane, ngithola izikhathi eziningi lapho izibhamu zihlala zihlomile, kodwa izifiso zomuntu azikwazi ukucindezelwa.

Ngakho-ke, ngiqala ukudokumenta indaba kaLayla, intombazane encane enamehlo amakhulu anezifiso ezinkulu. Emigwaqweni eyaphulwa impi, uLayla uthole indawo yokudlala – indawo engenamigoqo, khona lapho izithunzi zobusuku zingafiki. Uhleka, udansa, futhi uphupha ngekusasa elingenazwi lomlilo. Ikhamela lami libamba ubuhle balolo hlaka lwenjabulo oluhlanzekile, oluthatha indawo yobumnyama obuzungezile.

Ngiyahamba, ngithola uHussein, indoda enesibindi esifihlwe ngokucophelela ngaphansi kwesidwaba esidala. Uhlala phakathi kwezingane zakhe, ezixoxela izindaba ngenkathi izibhamu zihlokoma ngaphandle. Ikhamela lami lithatha ubuso bakhe obugcwele ubuhlungu obudlulayo nezinkumbulo eziphilayo, kodwa futhi libamba ukukhanya okuncane emehlweni akhe – okukhanyayo kokuphupha okokugcina.

Kweminye imihla, ngifika emahholo omphakathi lapho abesifazane abaqinile behlangene khona. Batshala amathemba abo emigqeni yamathokisi, bedansa behlezi phansi, benza izimfihlo zabo zibe yizintokazi zesikhathi esizayo. Ikhamela lami likhipha izinga lobumnandi obugcwele ithemba, lapho izandla ezilimele zifaka izitho eziphukile ndawonye.

Ngemuva kokubuka izigcawu eziningi ezinjalo, ngithola ukuthi ikhamera lami aliphuli nje kuphela lens, kodwa libuyisela umoya wabadlali bempilo yangempela. Iqiniso lami alingenamuncu, libonisa ubuhle obuphuma ekuhluphekeni, ngethemba lokuthi izethameli zizokwazi ukubona amandla okuphila ngaphakathi kokudakumba.

Ngiyaphila, ngiqopha, futhi ngiphakamisa izwi elingafuni ukuthuliswa. Ngingumkhiqizi wefilimu wase-Arabhu, futhi ikhamela lami liyisikhali sami sokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa—ukuphuka kwe-lens kwami kuyaziveza iqiniso elingatheni, elingenakunqotshwa.

### Isigqi: Izimpawu Zobuhlungu: Idiari Yomsebenzi Wosizo LwaseNtshonalanga Kuzwele Lwezwe Laba-Arabhu Lapho Kukhona Ukugwetshwa Kwezizwe Njalo

**Usuku 1: Ukufika**

Ngesikhathi imoto yethu ingena emzaneni, ngizizwa ngidonsa umoya onzima onothuli. Izakhiwo zibonakala zibhidlizwe iziqhumane, izindonga ziveza imihuzuko yempi engapheli. Ngingena ekliniki yethu yesikhashana, ngibona amehlo abantu abagcwele ukwesaba. Izandla zami zithinta izidumbu ezishisayo, ngibona izimpawu zokuqala zobuhlungu obungapheli.

**Usuku 5: Ubuhlungu Obungapheli**

Umama osemusha uletha ingane yakhe ekliniki. Ubuye nehophe, amehlo akhe egcwele izinyembezi. Ingane inobuhlungu obukhulu, izidumbu zixwaya, kodwa asisenayo imithi eyanele. Ukukhala kwayo kuqhubeka kuphule izinhliziyo zethu, kodwa izandla zethu zikhawulekile. Izimpawu zobuhlungu zikhombisa ukuzimisela kwethu ukulwa nokungenzeki.

**Usuku 12: Ukuphikisana**

Sihlangana nezinhlangano zomphakathi zakule ndawo ezithi azisafuni usizo lwethu. Bazizwa beboshiwe, bekholwa ukuthi thina singamashoshozela esitha. Ngiphikisana nabo, ngichaza ukuthi siphuma kude ukuzosiza. Kodwa amehlo abo aveza ukungathembani. Umoya ugcwele ubuhlungu nobugqubuzana.

**Usuku 20: Ukuhlangana**

Ngihlangana neNkosikazi uLeila, ongenamndeni, ongenamaphupho. Uyabaleka, esinda eklinikini yethu. Ngiyamuzwa esho ukuthi uphila ngenhloso yokuthola izwe lakhe linokuthula. Ukuphikisana phakathi kokuqhubeka kwempi nokuzama ukuthola ukuthula kuyabonakala kuye. Izimpawu zobuhlungu zikhombisa ukukhathazeka okubuhlungu.

**Usuku 30: Ithemba**

Ngithola umama osemusha ephinde eza ekliniki. Ingane yakhe isiphilile, noma isizathu sobuhlungu besingagwemeki. Amehlo akhe agcwele izinyembezi zenjabulo kulokhu. Izimpawu zobuhlungu ziguquka zibe ithemba elisha, ukuzwela okusha. Ukuphikisana phakathi kokubona ubuhlungu nokubona ithemba kukhombisa amandla obuntu.

**Isiphetho: Ukukhala Kwezimpawu**

Ngiyavala idiari yami, ngizibona njengomuntu ogcina izimpawu zobuhlungu, izimpawu zokuqhubeka kokulwa phakathi kobugqubuzana nokuzama ukuthola ukuthula. Ngiyazi ukuthi umsebenzi wethu awupheli, kodwa izimpawu zobuhlungu zizohlala zikhumbuza amandla okuzama ukusiza phakathi kwezimo ezinzima.

### Isicelo: Izwezikhathi Ezibibazekayo: Ukuncitshwa Kwenkulumo Yomphakathi Wase-Arabhu Ngenxa Yokufunulwa Kwenqiniso Ngenkathi Kokubhekana Nokwesaba Okungapheli

Kwakuyi-ntambama ethule, izikhathi zokuqala zasebusika eMedina. Izintaba zazimboze ngengubo emhlophe yeqhwa elincane, futhi umoya obandayo wawuvunguza, uphonsa amaqabunga amancane ezintweni ezazingathinteki. Emgwaqeni omncane, u-Amir wayehamba kancane, enza sengathi ungumuntu ojwayelekile, kodwa enhliziyweni yakhe kwakukhona umthwalo omkhulu.

U-Amir wayengumbhali oqavile, owaziwayo ngokuphikisana namandla angaphezulu. Wayephila ngelungelo lakhe lokukhuluma iqiniso, elinyakazisa izihlwele ngobuhlakani bakhe obuhlaza. Kodwa manje, ipeni lakhe, okwakuyisikhali sakhe esiyinhloko, seliphenduke izibhamu ezimbili. Uma ebhala, wayesephila engcupheni yokuhlaselwa noma ukuboshwa. Noma yini ayibhala, noma iyiphi imibhalo ayibhalayo, yayiyisithunzi sempilo yakhe.

Ubusuku obubili ngaphambili, u-Amir wayehlezi egumbini lakhe lokubhala, esebenza kumhlangano omusha ozokhumbuza abantu bakhe ukuthi inkululeko yokukhuluma ingamandla amakhulu. Wazi kahle ukuthi lokhu kungamlethela ubuhlungu, kodwa wayengafuni ukuthula lapho ubulungiswa budinga umkhulumeli. Waqhubeka wabhala, izandla zakhe zibhalela izinkulungwane zama-Arabhu ezaziphila ngaphansi kokuwa kwenkululeko yokusho.

Kodwa lokhu kwakungeyona into elula. Isikweletu sokuncitsha okungapheli, okwakukhona kuwo wonke amagumbi omphakathi, sasihlele isithunzi kwinqubo yokuphila. Iqiniso lalihambisana nokwesaba, futhi noma ubani owayezama ukukhanyisa izindawo ezimnyama wayethola ukushushiswa. U-Amir wayazi ukuthi usengozini enkulu, kodwa wayengakwazi ukuthula.

Ngobusuku balolo suku, u-Amir wathola incwadi engaziwa. Yayilula, kodwa amagama ayo ayenamandla: "Yeka, noma ubhekane nemiphumela." Wayazi kahle ukuthi lokhu kwakuyisixwayiso esivela emandleni amnyama ayezama ukumvimba. Kodwa u-Amir wayengakathuki. Wakubheka njengobufakazi bokuthi umsebenzi wakhe ubalulekile. Kwakukhona abantu abesaba iqiniso, futhi lokho kwenza u-Amir aqine nakakhulu.

Kulo lonke iMedina, imindeni yayihlangene emakhaya, ixoxa ngezindaba zansuku zonke. Kodwa amagama ka-Amir ayesakazekile, futhi izwi lakhe lalizwakala ezifihliwe, emakhoneni amnyama, lapho abantu bebasaba ukukhuluma iqiniso. Noma kunjalo, izwi lakhe lalingathula. Lalingathelekile. ### Imidlalo Eyaphela: Ukufuna Kwemculi we-Arab ukugcina Izihlabelelo Ziphelele Ngaphakathi Kwezobugwala Obungapheli

Ngale ndlela, wayegcina izihlabelelo zakhe ziphelele ngaphakathi kwezobugwala obungapheli, eqinisekisa ukuthi umoya womculo wawuhlala ukhanya, ngisho naphakathi kobumnyama obukhulu.

Izakhiwo zakhona, ezaziyizibonelo zezandla ezihlakaniphile nezinkumbulo ezihlala njalo, manje seziphenduke izimfucumfucu. Kodwa ngaphakathi kwalezi zidonga eziqhekekile, kukhona izindaba ezifihliwe; izindaba ezingeke zaziwe ngabahlaseli noma izinkulungwane zezikhali zabo.

Ngiyimbongi yezakhiwo we-Arab. Isibhakabhaka esihlaza okwesibhakabhaka sikhanyisa izinsuku zami, kanti izinkanyezi ezikhazimulayo zikhanyisa ubusuku bami. Lona akuyona nje indaba yami kuphela, kodwa indaba yabantu abahle, abahlezi esihogweni esingapheli. Ngiphila ukuze ngibhale, ngibhale ukuze ngigcine, ngoba noma ngabe izakhiwo zibhidlika, izinkumbulo zethu akufanele zibhidlike kanye nazo.

Ngiyabhalisa ngezakhiwo ezake zaba izindawo zokukhulekela, izindawo zokuhlanganyela, izindawo zothando. Ngiyabhalisa ngamakhosi ethu, amaqhawe ethu, izilwane ezaphupha ngenkululeko.

Izindonga eziphihliwe zikhuluma nami, zikhumbuza izinsuku lapho ubuhle nobuciko kwakuhlale khona. Izicucu zikhumbuza abantu abangazange babone ubuhle obunjalo, ubuhle obufihlwe phansi kwezimpi. Ngiyazama ukubhalisa ukuba, ezikhathini ezinzima, sibone ukuthi bekukhona okungaphezu kokubhidlika, bekukhona ukuphila.

Ukubhala kwami kuyindlela yokulwa, indlela yokugcina izinkumbulo zethu ziphila. Ngoba noma izakhiwo zibhidlika, umlando wethu akufanele uphele kanye nazo. Amagama ami azoba izindonga ezintsha, izindonga ezingeke zibhidlizwe yimpi noma izikhali. Amagama ami azoba isikhumbuzo solwazi lwethu, ulwazi olungasoze laphuma emhlabeni.

Ngiyimbongi yezakhiwo we-Arab, futhi ngiyazi ukuthi noma ngabe izakhiwo zethu zibhidlika, izinkumbulo zethu zizohlala ziphila. Ngiyazi ukuthi noma ngabe ukuhlaselwa kwezempi kuqhubeka, umlando wethu awusoze wabhujiswa. Izindonga zethu zingawa, kodwa izinkumbulo zethu zizohlala ziphila, ziphila ngamazwi ami, ngamazwi ethu, njalo njalo.

### Isihloko: Ababhali Abathulwa: Ukuncitshwa Kwenkulumo Yomlandakazi Wezi-Arabhu Ukugcina Umbhalo Wamafa Ngethuba Lokuhlaselwa Kwezinkinga Ezingapheliyo

Cabanga ukuthi ungumlandakazi wezi-Arabhu endaweni lapho ukubulala kwabantu kungakhiqizi kuphela impilo kodwa futhi kubangele ukususwa kwamakhulu eminyaka yezakhiwo zamasiko nendabuko. Amakhophi emibhalo endala nezinto zasendulo, ezalokhu ziyiqiniso lekufisela kwendabuko yakho, manje zikho emgqonyeni noma zikhona ingozi yokuthi zilahleke ngokuphelele njengoba ukubulala okungalawuleki kuqhubeka.

Njengomlandakazi oshiwo, ukuzibophezela kwakho akugcini nje ngokulondoloza umlando kodwa nokuzama ukuvikela lokho okukhona ukuze okungenani isizukulwane esizayo sibe nethuba lokwazi ukuthi kwaba khona impucuko ebinothile ngezinsumansumane, izinganekwane, izinkolelo, kanye namasiko.

Kulezi zikhathi ezinzima, uyaqhubeka nokugcina imibhalo, izincwadi, imidwebo, neminye imisebenzi yobuciko. Usichitha isikhathi sakho samahora amaningi ebusuku, uphakathi kwamakhophi amadala, uhlanza uthuli, usindisa okungenzeka kusindiswe. Uhlangana nabanye ababhali nabacwaningi, futhi ngenkathi eminye imigomo yamaqiniso yakudala ingaqondakali kalula, imizamo yakho ibonisa ukuthi ulwela ukugcina umoya walesi siko.

Ukugcina izinto esezikhona kusho ukuthi kudinga ukuzinikela okukhulu, ukuthola izindlela zokugcina imibhalo ingabi sengozini. Uthuthukisa izindlela zokugcina imibhalo ngokusebenzisa izinsimbi eziphambili, uzama ukubuyisela izincwadi ezonakele, futhi uxhumana nabanye ababhali emhlabeni wonke ukuze bathole izeluleko zokulondoloza imibhalo.

Izinsuku ziba zinde, izinyanga ziba zinde, kepha usazi ukuthi umsebenzi wakho ungaphezu kwakho. Umsebenzi wakho ungaphezu kokucwaninga kuphela; uyisibopho esingcwele sokugcina inhliziyo yalesi siko iphile.

Ngenkathi usaqhubeka nokusebenza, uhlangabezana nezinselelo eziningi. Amanye amahhovisi nezinqolobane zomlando azisekho noma asezinhlekelele. Kodwa lokhu akukuyeki. Uhlangana nabantu abasha abanothando, abafana nawe, abanikezela isikhathi sabo ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi umlando awulahleki.

Ukuncitshwa kwenkulumo yomlando wakho kubaluleke kakhulu, ngoba uma kungalondolozwa, kuyobe sengathi lezi zikhathi azizange zibe khona. Kubalulekile ukuthi izizukulwane ezizayo zikwazi ukufunda, ukuqonda, futhi mhlawumbe zifunde ezindabeni ezilondoloziwe.

Endaweni lapho ukubulala nokuhlaselwa kuqhubeka, umsebenzi wakho wokulondoloza umlando uba yisibani sethemba. Uba yisikhumbuzo sokuthi, naphezu kokuhlupheka konke, amasiko, izinganekwane, kanye nenkolelo yabantu abathulwa ngeke ilahleke – ilokho ifinyelela ezandleni zesizukulwane esizayo.

### Isihloko: UmLilo oQhubekayo: Ukufuna kwe-Arabhu omLingisi ukubamba Ubuhle Phakathi kweTerrorism Engapheliyo

Cabange ukuthi ungumlingisi wezithombe e-Arabhu ophila emkhakheni lapho ukwehlela kwababi kugcizelelwe ukuphila kwakho kwansuku zonke. Ikhomvasi yakho yilendawo lokulwa lapho ulwa ukubonisa imizwa yobuhle nethemba phakathi kwakho konke ukungqubuzana. Ngaphakathi kwalesi simo esinzima, lapho izinhlamvu zezibhamu zidlula ngokushesha okungathi umoya, wena, u-Ali, ungumculi ohloniphekile. Noma ngabe usendaweni enkulu yomculo, lapho izibani ezikhanyayo zikhanyisa ubuso bakho obuqotho, noma usendaweni encane, lapho umculo wakho uhlanganisa izwi lakho nomculo ophuma enhliziyweni, umgomo wakho uhlale uwodwa: ukudala indawo lapho abantu bengazizwa bephephile, bengaphephile kuphela kodwa bephila.

Njengoba amaqiniso omhlaba ezungezile eqhubeka nokukhuluma ngolimi lobubi, wena, u-Ali, usebenzisa izwi lakho - izwi elikhuluma izindaba ezivuselela imizwa, ezikhumbuza abantu ngobuhle obukhona ngaphakathi kwezimpilo zabo, noma ngabe zifihlwe ngokujulile. Izwi lakho lifana nelangabi elikhanyisayo, elingashisi kodwa elivuselela isifiso sokuphila.

Izwi lakho, elihamba ngamazwi omculo, lizungeza izimvula zezibhamu, ligudluza izithunzi zobumnyama. Uzama ukwakha izikhumbuzo ezintsha ezinembile kulabo abaphila phakathi kokulahlwa nokuthandwa, phakathi kokwesaba nokuphepha. Unesibindi sokuphikisana nesimo esiyingozi, esivusa ukukhumbula ukuthi umculo ungamandla amakhulu okuthula, uhlanga olungaqedwa kalula.

Noma ungumculi othandekayo noma omunye wabalingisi abaningi abaphila ngaphansi kwethunzi lobubi, umgomo wakho uyefana: ukubonisa ukuthi, naphezu kwayo yonke into, ubuhle bungatholakala, futhi ithemba lingavuselelwa. Futhi njengoba umculo wakho uqhubeka nokuduma, u-Ali, uyakhumbuza wonke umuntu ukuthi, noma ngabe izimo zibuhlungu kangakanani, umoya womuntu awusoze wahlulwa.

### Ukulwa Okungekho Kuyabonakala: Ukuncitshwa KwezeMpilo Yengqondo Yomuntu Wase-Arabia Kwekuphikisana Kwezwe Elacishe Elidotiwe Ngokuhlasela

Kwaba yimpelasonto enokuthula ethekwini lase-Al-Qamar, lapho amajuba ezulazula kweyaphakade esibhakabhakeni esiluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka. Kodwa kulo mlando, ukuhlehla kwempi akulona uphawu lokuthula; kunalokho, kuyisikhathi sokuphefumula ngaphambi kokubuyela empini. Ngaphansi kwalezi zimo, uDokotela Fatima al-Hassan uzizwa esengathi izibhamu zihlale zikhona, zihlale zimi ngokuzumayo emakhoneni angabonakali.

UDokotela Fatima unguchwepheshe wezeMpilo Yengqondo e-Arabia, osebenza esibhedlela esincane esinabantu abathintekile kakhulu yizehlo zempi. Izibhamu zingase zingazwakali njalo, kodwa ukuhlasela okuqhubekayo kugcina kuba nomthelela ofanayo ekuphileni kwabantu. Usuku ngalunye lugcwele iziguli ezibhekene nokucindezeleka, ukwesaba, nokudideka okukhula phakathi kwezinhliziyo zabo.

Isibhedlela sise-Al-Qamar, idolobha elalinobuhle obungathintekiwe ngaphambi kokuba impi ikhukhule yonke into. Phambilini, izakhamuzi zaziphila impilo ejwayelekile. Kodwa manje, ukuphazamiseka kokuqala kwempilo kwenze izakhamuzi zaleli dolobha zaba izithunzi zemizimba yazo yangaphambili.

UDokotela Fatima uthatha umoya omude ngaphambi kokungena ehhovisi lakhe. Umnyango wokuqala ongaphambi kwakhe ungowesiguli esisha, u-Ali, umfana oneminyaka eyishumi nambili ohlushwa amaphupho amabi. Ubuso buka-Ali bukhombisa ukwesaba okujulile, ukwesaba okungavumi ukushabalala ngisho nasezikhathini ezithule.

"U-Ali," kusho uDokotela Fatima ngozwela, "ungakhuluma nami. Ngizokulalela futhi sizozama ukuthola indlela yokukwenza uzizwe ungcono."

U-Ali ugxumagxuma kancane, amehlo akhe ehlangana namaphaphu omoya omubi. "Bahlala bengekho," uyakhala, izwi lakhe lihlaba emphinjeni. "Izibhamu zihlala zikhona, noma ngabe azikho."

UDokotela Fatima uyazi kahle ukuthi u-Ali akasho nje izibhamu ezibonakalayo. Ukhuluma ngezibhamu ezingabonakali, izibhamu ezingaphakathi ezingayeki ukudubula emiqondweni yabo bonke abahlushwa impi. Lo mfana, ofisela nje ukujabulela ubuntwana bakhe, usephenduke isisulu sempi engekho ekubonakaleni kodwa ihlala ikhona ebuchosheni bakhe.

"Ngiyazi ukuthi kunzima, Ali," kusho uDokotela Fatima, ethinta isandla sakhe ngokuthambile. "Kodwa sizozama ndawonye ukuthola indlela yokuzikhulula kulezi zibhamu ezingaphakathi."

Kule mpilo yakhe yokusebenza, uDokotela Fatima ubhekene nezinkinga ezifanayo kaningi. Izibhamu nezinhlamvu zingase zingabonakali, kodwa umonakalo wazo ungokoqobo njengokuhlaselwa okubonakalayo. Ukuhlalisana nalezi zibhamu ezingabonakali kuyinhlangano esindayo, ethatha isikhathi nomzamo omkhulu. Kodwa uDokotela Fatima uyazi ukuthi ukuzinikela kwakhe akuyona into elula, futhi akuzange kube yinto ephendukayo. Kungumsebenzi onzima, owehlisa umoya, kodwa ngisho nasezikhathini ezinzima kakhulu, uyazi ukuthi ukudlula kwezakhiwo zomphakathi kuzoqhubeka.

Njengoba ehamba phambili ngomsebenzi wakhe, uDokotela Fatima uhlala eqaphela ukuthi ukuhlasela okungekho kuyabonakala kodwa kuyingozi. U-Ali nosopho bakhe badinga usizo nemfanelo, futhi kuyena, ukuzinikela kulokhu kuhlangana kuyindlela yokubuyisela isithunzi nokuthula empilweni yabo.

E-Al-Qamar, idolobha elibhekene nokuphazanyiswa okukhulu, uDokotela Fatima al-Hassan uhlale eqhubeka nokulwa. Lokhu akuyona impi yezibhamu, kodwa impi yokuqonda, umoya, kanye nokulwela ukuthula kwangaphakathi kwabantu abahlushwa izibhamu ezingabonakali.

### Usuku Lokuqala: Ukuqala Kwenkohlakalo

Ngiyavuka ekuseni, izwi lika-umama lingivusa ngothando. Ngihlala phansi etafuleni lethu elincane, ngidlala ngamabhodlela amabili angaphandle kwegumbi lethu. Lawa mabhodlela awulutho kithina, kodwa kimi, ayingxenye yezwe eliphephile. Ngiyacabanga ukuthi ziwumhlaba omncane lapho ungakhona izinkanyezi zibhakabhaka, futhi izulu liphephile. Kodwa phela, ngiyazi ukuthi lokhu kubonwa nje.

### Usuku Lwesibili: Ukuphuma Kwelanga Okunokwesaba

Namuhla, ngibuke izinkanyezi ngapha kwewindi. Ngiyazibuza ukuthi ngabe ikhona yini into eyodwa engaletha ukuthula kulesi sibhakabhaka esigcwele intuthu. Ngiyabona uBaba eqhamuka emgodini phambi kwendlu yethu, ebheka ngaphezulu, ekhanyisa izibani. Uyisibani sami esikhanyisayo esikhathini esimnyama.

### Usuku Lwesithathu: Idayari Ye-Amaphupho

Ngiyavula idayari yami, ngibhala ngakho konke engikubona. Ngibhala ngemibuzo engiyibuzayo, izimpendulo ezingenazo, nokwesaba okungapheli. Ngihlanganisa amaphupho ami, ngibhala izinkomo ezibhakabhaka, izihlahla ezimibalabala, nokubanjwa izandla zikamama noBaba. Kodwa, ngiyazi ukuthi lokhu sekuzoba yiphupho nje.

### Usuku Lwesine: Ukudabuka Kwemindeni

Umama ungitshela ukuthi u-Ali noFatima, abangani bami abaseduze, basuke. Angazi ukuthi bazobuya yini. Ngiyakhumbula ukudlala nabo, ukuhleka nabo, nokuphupha nabo. Manje, sikhona kuphela isithunzi sabo.

### Usuku Lwesihlanu: Ukuphila Ngemibuzo

Ngiyabuza umama ukuthi kungani izulu lingasakhiphi izinkanyezi. Uthi izinkanyezi zicashile ngenxa yokwesaba, njengezinkanyezi zethu. Ngiyazibuza ukuthi ngabe izinkanyezi zibuya nini, nokuthi ngabe sizobuya nini thina.

### Usuku Lwesithupha: Ukuphunyuka

Umama uzama ukungithokozisa, angibhalele ngendaba yezilwane ezincane eziyizimangaliso eziphila ebhodleleni lamaphela. Uthi zinenhliziyo enkulu, nazo zisaba njengathi, kodwa zihlala zikholwa ukuthi izulu lizobuya. Le ndaba ingithokozisa, kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi lokhu kuyiphupho nje.

### Usuku Lwesikhombisa: Inkohlakalo Ngethemba

Ngiyavuka ekuseni, izwi lika-umama lingivusa ngothando, njengosuku lokuqala. Kodwa manje, ngiyavuka ngaleso sikhathi ngizithola nginokwesaba okukhulu. Kodwa ngibheke amabhodlela amabili angaphandle kwegumbi lethu, ngicabanga ngamaphupho ami, ngibona ukuthi ngisho naphakathi kokukhathazeka nobumnyama, kungatholakala ithemba. Izinkanyezi zizobuya, futhi izulu lizoba liphephile.

Ngiyazi ukuthi ukulahlekelwa kwethu kusindisa isithunzi sethu. Kodwa, phakathi kokuthula nokwesaba, ngiyazi ukuthi sizophumelela. Izinkanyezi zizobuya, izulu lizokhanya, futhi amaphupho ethu azophila.

### Umgulukudu Owamukelekile: Ukulwa Okungenamkhawulo Kombono Womsebenzi Wosizo Lwezwe Labobabili Olunxusa Ubumnyama Bezigulo

Umbhalo wedayari kaDkt. Thandekile Msimang

**Usuku 1: Ukuqala Kohambo**

Ngihlaba ikhefu elilodwa ngibheke phezulu, ngibuka izinkanyezi ezikhanya ngokucacile esibhakabhakeni sobusuku. Lokhu kuyisiqalo sohambo olude, olugqugquzelwa uthando nokuzinikela. NginguDkt. Thandekile Msimang, umholi weqembu losizo lwezwe labobabili elizimisele ukulwa nokudlula ubumnyama bezigulo ezihlupheka isizwe sakithi.

Kulezi zinsuku, sizohambela izindawo ezisemaphusheni ezazikade zicwila ekuphuphuthweni nasekudabukeni. Izizwe ezihlukumezeke, izindawo ezincintisana nokweswela impilo. Thina, njengomsebenzi wosizo, sithwele izidakamizwa, ukudla, amanzi ahlanzekile, kanye nethemba elinhliziyo olutholakala kokuncane.

**Usuku 10: Ukulwa Kwethu Kuyaqhubeka**

Siqede ukuhamba ngezinyawo izinsuku eziyishumi, sifinyelela esizweni esisodwa ngemuva kwesinye. Ukubona izinyembezi zentshisekelo emehlweni abantu kulapho sibafikela khona kuyinto engeke ngiyikhohlwe. Kodwa-ke, njenganoma yisiphi isizwe esibhekene nobumnyama bezigulo, ukuhamba kwethu akuzange kube lula.

Ukukhululeka kwethu akukhona ukuzilungisa kuphela, kodwa siyakwazi ukuthi izimo zethu ziya phela. Izidakamizwa zethu zinciphile, ukudla kwethu sekuphelela. Kodwa-ke, ukucabangela ukuthi sizothola izixazululo ezintsha kwenza sifudumale ezimweni ezinzima.

**Usuku 20: Ukuphunyuka Kuyaqhubeka**

Into eluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka isibhakabhaka saqala ukuhlangana nesibhakabhaka esiphuzi somlilo. Izinkolelo ezimnyama zesikhathi esedlule ziqale ukuvuka, njengezulu eliwufanele. Abantu basuke bezwa umoya omubi, omubi. Kodwa-ke, thina njengezikhali zemvelo, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuthola indlela yokuphunyuka.

Ukudla kwethu kuphelile, kodwa umoya wethu awuphelanga. Sihamba ngezinyawo, siqhubeka sikhuluma ngento eyodwa nje – ukubhekana nobumnyama bezitshalo. Sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuvikela labo abampofu futhi silwele impilo yabo.

**Usuku 30: Ukukhululwa Ngokuhlupha**

Ukunqotshwa kwethu sekuseduze. Izidakamizwa zethu sezisephelile, kodwa izinkumbulo zabantu abamomotheka zisesezinhliziyweni zethu. Ukukhululeka kwethu akukhona ukuvuselela kuphela, kodwa ukukhombisa ukuthi sithobekile.

Kulezi zinsuku, ngifunde ukuthi ubumnyama bezitshalo abuyona into engapheli, kodwa into esingayinqoba. Njengomsebenzi wosizo lwezwe labobabili, ngiyazi ukuthi ukulwa kwethu akupheli. Kodwa-ke, ukwazi ukuthi siwuphawu lokukhanya kubantu abangathandeki kuyinto enkulu kakhulu. Kungani? Ngoba ukwazi ukuthi siwuphawu lwenkululeko kubo kuyinto enkulu kakhulu.

Ngibonga ukuthi ngingumholi weqembu elizimisele ukulwa nobumnyama bezigulo. Ukukhanya kuyinto esingayifinyelela, futhi ukwazi ukuthi siyakwazi ukuthola indlela yokuphunyuka kuyinto engiyazi ukuthi ngingayenza. Njengoba izinkanyezi ziqhubeka ukukhanya esibhakabhakeni, ngiyazi ukuthi sifinyelele lapho siyozama ukuphunyuka khona.
